website_summaries.verdict: Ortho Home Defense spray lets you create a perimeter around the edges or outside of your home, keeping chemicals out of your kitchen and other living areas.
pros: Spray on non-porous surfaces to create a bug barrier that lasts up to 12 months
Kills ants, roaches, spiders, and other insects
Can help you determine where insects are entering your home
cons: Need to keep pets and small children away until product dries

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: See the ants See the ants all in a line See the ants all in a line going to and fro Busy busy ants 1 squirt 2 squirts See all the dead ants Poor ants But I don't feel sorry for them Sneak in my house, you take your chances.
customer_reviews.author: night player

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a life saver!, I was worried after people said theirs didn't come with the house or sprayer. I've never purchased something like this before, and it took me a bit to realize that the house was actually stuffed into the sprayer. Once I found that out, the entire process was easy, I sprayed the inside and outside with this, and it sure did its job. The next day I noticed a dramatic difference with the ants and critters that were crawling around. I would definitely purchase this again once I use up the bottle. It this review was at all helpful to you, tell me so by hitting "YES" below. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: WORKS LIKE A CHARM! EASY TO USE AND VERY EFFECTIVE!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! I am 100% TERRIFIED of all bugs but especially spiders. In the past I paid hundreds and hundreds of dollars to have an exterminator out to spray so that I would not need to worry about dealing with them however when I came upon some financial troubles that was one of the first costs I had to cut. Thankfully I found this spray and after spraying both the outside and inside of my home myself within 15-20 minutes, was completely bug free for so far almost 4 weeks now. I will be spraying again soon however this product has passed my test! I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cousin

customer_reviews.title: Safe fir all after cimpletly dry. KILLS ALL BUGS DEAD, & KEEPS THEM OYT.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. I like the FACT that it IS NOT HARMFUL TO HUMANS OR PETS AFTER IT DRYS. It works great and lasts awhile. I spray the steps going into my home and around the entire perimeter. Spiders & Fleas thrive in this.area, this Product keeps them OUT. YOU can safely spray irbon pet bedding. Just be certain it is completely dry before allowing pets back on it.Amazon has the Best Price for this product...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! We moved into an apartment with a horrible cockroach problem. This stuff sprayed around makes it so that when you do see them, they're dead or dying. Additionally, there were some cinder blocks that we discovered had tons (around 10) of black windows. Sprayed this on some and it killed them almost instantly. Within a day, I did not see any more black widows. This stuff is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chibili

customer_reviews.title: Deadly Welcome
customer_reviews.text: I have a storage shed behind my house that is a bug magnet especially of the ant variety. I gave it a good spraying both inside and out with this insect killer. After a day or so there was no sign of ants although I am sure that when this killer fades out the ants will be back. However, I will be ready to welcome them with more spray as soon as they appear. Thanks Ortho.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have battery operated sprayer.  Still kills creepy crawlies.
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff inside around windows and at door/window thresholds and the granules in the yard as a perimeter. If it crawls, it dies. It even works on the big, juicy wolf spiders. Not thrilled about the hand operated sprayer (thus only 3 stars), as most now have the battery operated spray pump for the same price. I'll just pop in the battery pump, otherwise you'll get carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Troutcannon

customer_reviews.title: Go with Raid!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these hoping to control and eradicate a creeping roach problem before it gets worse. I was happy to use the wand and spray to my hearts content! That’s pretty much it. You spray roaches and expect them to stop in their tracks, but no. It’s like you’re spraying them with water. They just scurry away. Save your money, go with a tried and proven product like Hot Shot or Raid.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Marin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product had no effect whatsoever on the bugs in my home. I applied this spray as directed repeatedly throughout my home and it didn't kill a single roach or any other bug. In fact, just this morning in my kitchen I spotted a roach. So I sprayed this directly onto the roach. The force of the spray flipped the bug on its back. But after a moment the roach simply flipped over and ran away. I might as well be spraying water.
customer_reviews.author: Donavon B.

customer_reviews.title: Works if you spray it directly on roaches for a few seconds
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing for my NYC roaches from my hoarder neighbor. They walk right over where I spray.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Dell Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Whack
customer_reviews.text: Moved into an apartment that has a problem. I followed instructions and sprayed the perimeter and common roach sighting areas. I've even sprayed roaches directly, and they don't care. Tbf, I've tried other products and they're not doing a whole lot either. Time to move.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The rain has made the bugs come in!!!! Unfortunately, I had to wait a couple of weeks to use it. When I did go to use it the spray part that goes back and forth was BROKEN! I cleaned out all the cabinets, sprayed and put everything back. wasn't sure if it was working. I cleaned of one counter and sprayed it. came back around 2 hrs later and there were 3 roaches walking around, like nothing. URGH.
customer_reviews.author: nisha thompson

customer_reviews.title: Useless on fleas. Product might just be water for all I know.
customer_reviews.text: Interestingly, no claims about long-term effectiveness are made for any insects aside from ants, roaches, and spiders. I can't speak to roaches or spiders, but I was using this to address ants and fleas. Fleas just laugh at this stuff. Much like the Honey Badger, they just don't care about this at all. Had one on my arm, I sprayed it directly, and it just sat there like nothing happened for a minute, then jumped away. And since they specifically only talk about ants, roaches, and spiders for long-term control, I'm betting it doesn't repel/kill fleas for any length of time. Haven't yet tried it on ants, since I'm instead using Terro baits for that now.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Waffle of the Breakfast Empires

customer_reviews.title: Landscape, Tree Leaf and area infrestation almost eliminated.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to relative in GA living near forest and having over hanging trees and lots of mulched landscaping. Everyone there is combating critters. i never knew there was such a thing as big landscape and tree leaf roaches. I sent various products and the population that WAS overwhelming is greatly reduced to occasional tiny ones. Must be diligent in applications of all related products. The neighbors need to treat their areas too. You can see them crawling outside on their screen doors and such. Very bad infestation originally.
customer_reviews.author: YourNorthernSouthern

customer_reviews.title: I Hate Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does a good job showing those creepy crawlers who's boss. It has killed flies, spiders, ants and other random insects. The bottle sprays very easily and doesn't have an odor. It's very affordable and allows you to cover a lot of problematic areas. I've had pretty good results so I'd recommend this product as a least expensive option yo e hiring an exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: kaiseristhereason

customer_reviews.title: worked for about 3 weeks, I actually took the ...
customer_reviews.text: worked for about 3 weeks, I actually took the cap off and dumped it on the ant mounds, not they are back stronger than ever.. Watered down version of raid.
customer_reviews.author: stan pappy

customer_reviews.title: We live pretty far in the suburbs
customer_reviews.text: We live pretty far in the suburbs, and we get a ton of crickets and cockroaches during the summer months. I decided to invest in this big size because I never wanted to be caught without some bug spray! I did a spray of all of our outdoor areas (windows, doors, etc.) and then I would use it as a spot treatment as well when I would find them inside the house. It works great, and helps me sleep at night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as turns out the only thing even remotely close to good about what I received was that it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought with the Ortho name this would be a quality product, as turns out the only thing even remotely close to good about what I received was that it was a lot of it....what I ended up with is a large container of water which we all know doesn't kill roaches,it only makes em scurry off faster...a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff flat works and lasts for many months. I live in the country and have stink bugs, spiders, crickets and huge centipedes galore. I spray the outside of the house and inside the garage every 6 months and never find any of these critters living once they cross the boundary line I put down. Much cheaper than hiring an exterminator and the sprayer works well. I will continue to buy this brand and also the granules by the same name work very well for a barrier around my half acre to keep red ants and such at bay.
customer_reviews.author: P. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for the past 3 years and in two different houses. I've never had any problems with bugs. I spray the interior and exterior of my house at the change of every season. I can't stand bugs inside so I reapply more often than instructed. I also do this because rain and weather can lessen the results. The spray handle is great and makes for easy application. I would definitely recommend this product. Hands down the best on the market and you can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emcopus89

customer_reviews.title: Swear by it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal online compared to in stores!! This works great against spiders and such. Repplication is key or the spiders will come right back though, so buy two bottles while you're here. We live on a lake and spiders are horrible! We spray the docks, the boats, the water toys, the outdoor furniture, etc. It works immediately!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed my whole apartment with this (who knows, maybe it's not meant to be used in apartments?) and it's affects lasted for about a week. I have continued to use it when I see spiders in my place in the hopes that it will work. I must say though, that I haven't seen any ants around my place (though I have never had an ant problem in my apartment). Bottom line: I am not disappointed with this product, but I am not convinced that it has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Zupp

customer_reviews.title: Product works
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for a monthly process. It does make you home bug free. The only time you see a bug its dead. The downside is the spray part. Luckily I bought some weed killer at one point that had a battery powered spray handle, or I'd never get through spraying my house. I spray the whole jug once a month. Another concern I have, I would like to know that I'm not hurting my dog by keeping my home bug free.
customer_reviews.author: Gotham Knight

customer_reviews.title: Don't even think twice cuz this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: This product NEVER fails me. And I'm soooo glad because I hate hate hate these things.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great in home product around pets
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Scares the little bugs away or kills them exceedingly well. Had a roach/pine beetle problem and it fixed that quickly! This product is far less likely to irritate allergies and I feel safe using around my pets as directed on the label. This is my go-to bug squirter for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Arryk

customer_reviews.title: and the size is great, you can carry it around and spray it ...
customer_reviews.text: we had a ton of black widows on the side of our house. I sprayed along the fence line ONCE and I havent seen a shred of evidence of them since. they either moved away or hopefully died. this stuff definitely works. havent seen a web or a spider around there since. and the size is great, you can carry it around and spray it from the retractable hose extension thing, and then store it away until you notice another problem. good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beware product was described one way sent another
customer_reviews.text: No hose was sent. Ordered MAX formula and received regular its very weak doesn’t last months as advertised wish i could tell about max but sry I didn’t receive any. The regular formula you can get in town lot cheaper than here. I have ants and been using regular formula I have to spray every couple months oh well beware. and hopefully yours comes with hose i just happened to have empty jug with hose still on it thankfully I didn’t trash it yet otherwise this purchase would have been completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Missing hose...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but it came without the hose that attaches the sprayer, so I had to transfer it to another bottle to even use it. As an insecticide, it works great, and is safe for pets and kids once it dries. It has kept my front porch and mailbox spider-free for a month now, and from past experience with this, I expect it to last a couple more. When I use it, I wear gloves and coral my cats into a room until where I've sprayed is dry. I spray my baseboards, around my doors and windows, and pretty much anywhere I've even imagined I've seen a spider.
customer_reviews.author: Lexiglass

customer_reviews.title: Also gives a great indication of where bugs are coming in
customer_reviews.text: It kills them bugs dead, can't ask for more. Nothing more satisfying than coming home and seeing dead bug bodies along the lines I had sprayed months ago (like an electric fence for pests). Also gives a great indication of where bugs are coming in, they don't survive more than a few steps on the line, I was able to calk off a decent amount of the entry ways. Great tool all around. Doesn't hurt itch or burn after it's dried which lets me know it's safe, stings a little when wet so I know it works :P.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Bottle comes empty!
customer_reviews.text: (First order broke during shipment) second shipment arrived COMPLETELY empty! The entire bug killer liquid was gone! I have been more than patient......especially with my centipede/spider invested place (gotta love the bottom floor of an apartment). Not to mention I have Arachnophobia. I am so disappointed. Save time and money and purchase somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pump works well. Definitely keeps bugs out if used on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me. We have had a spider problem at my house since we bought it and the worse part of it was that they liked to make their webs by the main entrance to my house and around the light fixtures outside by that entrance. This was a constant problem, i was always sweeping them away with a broom. I used this product, sprayed it around the doors and windows and I did not have any spider problem for the rest of the summer. I will be re-applying this in the spring for sure. This stuff worked great for me and the built in sprayer made it very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL FOR ROACHES OR FLEAS!!! Total waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I still find roaches running around. I have sprayed every week!!!! This is supposed to work for several months!!! It doesn't even work for a day!!!!!!! Call a professional! Don't waste your money on this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Horror chic

customer_reviews.title: Kill the beast!
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick, had to apply twice till I really saw some good results. After the first application I was still seeing creepy crawlers a month later, did another treatment and that seems to have done the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great value, spray nozzle works way better than aerosol!
customer_reviews.text: Love the price value for this item! I used it so often to rid my backyard and kitchen of annoying ants and a few spiders as well. The spray nozzle works super well, the trigger is soft, doesn't get stuck; better than aerosol! The mist doesn't fly back onto your hand/arm like an aerosol could. I will probably buy another one soon, it's a must have to combat pesty ants!
customer_reviews.author: Gsr4jimmi

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought this product two years ago, it worked very well. This time, not so much. After I sprayed it, I see the ants literally walk over the sprayed area like nothing has happened. I thought I just got a bad bottle. Bought another one, and then yet one more, the same: ants are not afraid of it any more. Not sure if the product has changed or the ants are immune to it now.
customer_reviews.author: hhd-of-ca

customer_reviews.title: We have a terrible ant problem in this part of CA
customer_reviews.text: We have a terrible ant problem in this part of CA; they come in through every possible crack: windows, baseboards, drains, it's awful. I use this every time they find a way in, and they're gone...until they find another way in. Then I treat that one, and they're gone again. At this point, the whole house is treated, and we finally have ant-free days. I have gone through two bottles in the past year and this is the ONLY product that successfully got rid of the ants and kept them away. I will never be without this product, what a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam44

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! I've been using this same brand for over seven years, and when used as directed, it very effectively keeps the spiders away for months at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schone

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for years and my home and apartments. I absolutely love this product. The spray nozzle that comes on this one is better to me than the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Eboni Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: ANTS-NO-MORE!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, this insect killer pleasantly surprised me! I found out about this stuff from a co-worker after mentioning that i had a bunch of ants in my house from a new puppy and leaving the door open & food out. After spraying this stuff around the inside perimeter of my home (especially around the doors/windows) i saw an IMMEDIATE improvement within a couple days. After about a week or so there was literally NO ants in my house. I'm totally sold on this product and would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great barrier, but needs reapplication sooner than it says here
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this product, although it does seem to need re-application more than I expected (it certainly did not last 12 months- maybe more like 1-2 outside?). One of the biggest pros here though is that you can safely do a barrier and even use it inside of your home. I used this in combination with an outdoor/backyard spray and the bugs have finally vacated.
customer_reviews.author: am Seal

customer_reviews.title: Ding dong dead
customer_reviews.text: Continually seeing dead 💀 bugs around the outside of my home which makes me happy knowing they’re not coming in. Also, cleaning up the dead ones that had already invaded our house. This, along with the bait homes, seems to being doing a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this product works really well for everything except "crazy ants" (which seem to eat it for breakfast) If you use as directed it will last a very long time. I use it for the outside perimeter of the house and find dead buts all the time. I particularly like the hand sprayer as it easy easier to use than the one that you have to pump, so I will use this to refill the other bottle or switch te hand sprayers
customer_reviews.author: D. Rich

customer_reviews.title: I sprayed it the recommended one foot wide from the side of the house ...
customer_reviews.text: The only insect spray that actually keeps the ants away from the house. I sprayed it the recommended one foot wide from the side of the house where the sidewalk abutts the house. This works. However, it was difficult for me to hold the heavy jug and spray at the same time, so I used a different sprayer that has a connected tube that goes to the bottom of the container, making it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Good for Ants
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a new house, and had a serious ant problem. I tried more natural insect killers, since I have small children and was pregnant to no avail. The ants were getting so crazy we kept the trash outside, were constantly cleaning (not a easy feat pregnant with 2 toddlers), and after few weeks of that, I had to find a better solution. I settled on this spray, and it works well, but only for a week or so. I am not sure if it has something to do with the rain water washing it away. So only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: This works..try it for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Home defense works great. I use it every year inside and out. I had not used it for two years after using it every year for 5 years. I remained ant and pest free. I saw bugs and ants this summer, that I have not seen before and realized I had not been spraying. So I got mine out and had to order more to continue keeping the pest at bay. For two years of not spraying I was still protected.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: I guess it gets a star....but only because after the second application outside the spiders finally died. After the first application they just ran. This product does not kill them instantly...or even soon. I myself had to put 3 treatments on before i haf any results....and that was tidious. The hand pump hurts after 2 minutes of spraying, making this much harder than other products with battery power. I'd pay the extra $5 for an automatic pump THAT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea G.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great for keeping ants at bay! Moved into a rental that had an ant problem and 2 uses outside and 1 treatment in and no more ants inside! I picked this because of the great reviews so here is my review!
customer_reviews.author: rach b

customer_reviews.title: I am well pleased.  It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have an ant problem every single year. I've sprayed with many cans of the popular commercial ant and roach killer and the little pests come back anyway. This product has kept them away since the initial spraying. I'm well pleased. There is no scent, and it seems to put up a barrier that ants, spiders and other buts just do not cross.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: It's like a force field!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to keep bugs out of your house, or at least kill them after they take a few steps in, buy this product!! It works on everything. I live in Western Georgia, and all the critters that try and get in always end up dead a few feet from the door. I would much rather take care of a dead bug than a live one! We also used to have a pretty bad problem with ants, but after a perimiter (inside and out) spray down of this product, not a problem anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jay

customer_reviews.title: It could have been stronger, not killing roach as it should
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use with the sprayer directly connected with the container. I would say the price is very reasonable for the amount you get. This is okay product if you are dealing with only open space, but most of the time that's is not the case. This product is not strong enough to kill roach without direct application on it. I need to order something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Bug be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I will always be amazed by the results of this product. I’ve used it for years and it continues to produce results. Easy to use and lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product...I have a problem with those tiny jumping spiders...I sprayed everywhere I have seen them...especially around windows sills...it has now been a week since I sprayed and I haven't seen a one...well worth the money...their is one con: the spray hose does not really work I had to pour the bug spray in a spray bottle then use the spray bottle instead of the hose...which wasn't really a problem since I have spray bottles laying around my house...
customer_reviews.author: nitabk1

customer_reviews.title: We just moved into a house where the Asian beetles ...
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a house where the Asian beetles seemed to appear out of thin air left and right. Sprayed this around the house once before we had a company (already scheduled before we bought this) come spray the house. Needless to say, we haven't seen any bugs with a combination of the two of them. We bought a second one and will keep it around just in case we see some extra bug friends during the winter months. Works indoors and outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Blahnik

customer_reviews.title: Protect this house!
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a year. I spray the inner perimeter of the house 1 day and the outer the next day. Dont bother with the included sprayer(even the battery powered one); get a lowes/homed sprayer designed for bleach(the $15 one, not the $10) and it will last you for good long while.
customer_reviews.author: FoggyMcDuffman

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a foreclosure with issues...... worked great. This was recommended by my cousin in another state who has a pest control company. You see more bugs after you put it down cause it draws em out. Dont spray pesticide where you put the bait cause then they avoid the area. You want em to eat it and die not just jode in the cracks from the stinky raid. Takes a couple weeks and two applications but now we havent seen one in weeks
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: We moved in to a new apartment and we were ...
customer_reviews.text: We moved in to a new apartment and we were so alarmed by all the bugs. We have a slight gap in our front door and the spiders were coming in by the dozen. We sprayed the whole apartment with the Home Defense MAX and I haven't seen a bug in our apartment since. The last time we sprayed was in the beginning of July and now it's the middle of November and we still haven't seen any bugs! My husband has a canopy over his truck bed and we had a black widow infestation so we sprayed it down and it's done the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The beginning was great.
customer_reviews.text: It is keeping certain insects away. As well as killing spiders. But I'm still having spiders enter through where I have sprayed. This is two weeks later. The beginning was great. Update 6/03 I did a heavy spray a week ago. I haven't seen anything alive now. Only dead bugs are found. This stuff is garbage. Don't say it keeps bugs away up to 12. Ha more like 12 days
customer_reviews.author: James michael

customer_reviews.title: gets rid of creepy crawlies
customer_reviews.text: Same ingredients as the exterminator came to use. We have a big ant problem in my apartment and once this is sprayed they stop coming in immediately, so far it has lasted over a month and I expect at least 4 months. The nozzle and spray makes it easy to use. I'm sure you can use this product on walls and ceilings but so far I've only used it on baseboards and window sills which is why I still have some spiders.
customer_reviews.author: TechBull805

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working. I've stopped hearing my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working. I've stopped hearing my wife scream at the wall because of a little spider. Instead she jumps on stuff because the spiders are dead ground.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A truly effective pest control product!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO effective for all the bugs in our garden, and in and around our house and outdoor buildings, workshop, and barn!
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyGirlSometimes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!  Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since we bought our house 5 years ago. I use it inside and outside. I hate to say this but after a spray of the inside perimeter, it's just a matter of time before I find a dead bug or 2. My wife will leave the bug where it lays so I can see my handy work. I spray outside – around the house perimeter and definitely in the carport area and my two attached workshops. Works every time.
customer_reviews.author: KarmaPolice

customer_reviews.title: There is no trigger sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I just got this sent to my house this morning and opened it and no spray gun was included which makes the product completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Killed my bug problem, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since my apartment seemed to have a lot of grasshoppers and bugs running around. With only one application, I started to notice dead bugs lying around so this spray worked like a charm! For application, I sprayed around all openings into the apartment (both external and internal) such as the doorways, ducts, and all windows. If you are having bug issues, give this a shot. Don't forget to reapply at normal intervals!
customer_reviews.author: Adsut10

customer_reviews.title: Not good for spiders
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well for deterring spiders or other bugs. I've had two reapply every day to deter bugs other than spiders. Doesn't kill them on contact either. You have douse them in it and will kill them in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ILikeDonutz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I've used it for a few months and it is very effective!! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Used as we were seeing huge spiders everywhere! I used this everywhere havent seen any yet but will update if things change. Handle doesnt work that well wish was little less cheap of handle
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Kills spiders dead instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Kills spiders dead instantly. I'm sooo happy I bought this. Not sure how useful it is as a preventative spray as I've found more spiders over the last 6 months since I've initially used this, but I do notice that my balcony is less spiderweb-covered than it used to be, so it must be acting as a deterrent at some level. Regardless though, I'm impressed at the instantaneous results when using it directly on the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Yang

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Seem to Work On Any Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed the living hell out of a bug and it’s still living. Another mf ugly mutant roach managed to scurry across the barrier too! Not good
customer_reviews.author: Sam O

customer_reviews.title: Better Bang for my Buck.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well with the spider infestation I had in my garage and with the ants on my patio. I use twice a month around the perimeter of my house and inside and outside of my garage and it has made a tremendous difference. I fired Orkin in spring and I'm getting better results.
customer_reviews.author: Bookcritic4readers

customer_reviews.title: awesome! No bugs!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in apartment and the pest control they have come out to spray sucks, I never had so many bugs and a huge ant problem. I bought this and I haven't seen one thing ever again. Ants gone! The only thing I ever see is everything that died and I vacuum up. Love and very easy to spray in and outside of your place. Very much recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Benson

customer_reviews.title: works well, slight delay
customer_reviews.text: I have to correct my original feedback, because there's a bit of a delay in the effectiveness of this product.. the bugs will continue to come for about 24 hours, then I noticed a day later there weren't any more bugs in my kitchen during late night hours. This stuff works quite well, just be aware it takes a day or so to kick in.
customer_reviews.author: muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received a bottle with no sprayer wand that was leaking. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good for roachs/palmetto bugs
customer_reviews.text: Works for roaches/palmetto bugs so far. I applied this back about 4-6 weeks ago and I have not seen a roach since. We really never had too many roaches, but we would see one occasionally and I don't want to see them at all. As far as other insects, I haven't seen any with the exception of ants. I did not find this helpful with ants which is why I gave it four out of five stars. The ants were not phased and that is a bit of an issue we are experiencing in the kitchen. I had to use a secondary product.
customer_reviews.author: beccalam13

customer_reviews.title: Inevitable for me each year
customer_reviews.text: I always wish I could make it through the year without spraying, but it seems like the ants get more bold every year until I spray, then they dissappear. This also helps with the ever increasing tick problem in NH. Just like all "barrier" products, this is bad for cats, fish, and bees. Hence why I hate spraying the stuff, but our lives become miserable with bugs if we don't. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Bobaganoosh

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It will kill bugs on contact but they ignore my "bug barrier". It's kind of a weak solution.
customer_reviews.author: Alice WakefieldTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenient spray hose!
customer_reviews.text: I se Ortho Max Home defense only twice a year! I have a theory that Oregon was built on top of a giat ant hill! They are EVERYWHERE!!! & ONCE U GET THEM IN YOUR HOME...YOUR OUTTA LUCK! I use Ortho Max around the perimeter of my home to help keep the buggies OUT cuz once they get in...they will Never leave!!! Thank you Ortho..your the best!
customer_reviews.author: missiejojo36

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hose!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Product did not come with hose(sprayer) as shown in picture. Which is the main reason I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've heard good things about this product and just sprayed around the perimeter of my house this weekend. I heavily sprayed and only used about 1/2 of the bottle. There are lots of critters in Hawaii so my neighbors use this often and I decided to try it. They said they spray once a month and get no bugs. Just let it dry before letting pets outside. So far I have not seen a single bug in the house so fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Harlacher

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP PACKAGE CAUSED HAZARDOUS LEAKING!!!
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS! HAZARDOUS! Ortho made this product with a pathetically thin plastic container. When the product arrived, I removed the nozzle from the side and the package ripped open! The insect poison immediately started hemorrhaging out all over my kitchen! If the package can't withstand simply removing the nozzle to begin using it it is an absolute HAZARD! Do not buy this product. The last thing you want is this poisonous fluid pouring all over like it did in my house.
customer_reviews.author: KK_Cons

customer_reviews.title: Haven't noticed it helping
customer_reviews.text: You can def buy this at Home Depot for $7 which I found that out afterwards. I also haven't noticed it helping at all with bug door and window control.. so I think this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, animal safe and no smell. Will see if it really lasts 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Only product I have tried that actually keeps ants from coming back. We get them about once a year, and other products kill the ants on contact, but they continue to come back the next day. I only have to use this once a year around baseboards and doors and the ants stay away!! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph W

customer_reviews.title: I personally didn't have good luck with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Eh, can't really say I noticed a difference in bugs around my home after spraying this. I sprayed the perimeter of the house and around windows and doors, as well as some problem areas in my basement. I was trying to defend again yellow sac spiders, aggressive house spiders, and earwigs. A week after application I was still spotting spiders in those same problem areas of the basement and noticed the same amount of earwigs and yellow sac spiders in my home. Maybe they were there before and didn't have a chance to come in contact with the poison. Maybe this doesn't work on spiders..who knows?
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I have a big garage that doubles as a workshop/ hangout space. I will spray the corners and edges of the floor. Hardly ever see any spiders in there anymore and when I do find them they are dead. Also kept spiders off of the soffits on my house, big change from the years before.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I have HUGE (seriously like the size of a mouse) spiders and occasionally some ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have HUGE (seriously like the size of a mouse) spiders and occasionally some ants that get into my house. Spraying around my doors and along baseboards in the kitchen and basement keeps all the bugs away for a long time. It's definitely more effective than raid and it doesn't have any odor. The spray nozzle can make your hand hurt after a while but you have a lot more control over the chemicals than with an aerosol spray.
customer_reviews.author: ksnatale

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, doesnt smell
customer_reviews.text: Works well for border conrol. I use it indoor too and I have a pet . Smell is not bad. I spray regularly for ants (gost, crazy legs and carpenter ants). A great deterent. Last about a month. Had a really bad carpenter ant problem in my back yard. The product made special for carpenter ants didn't work. This cleared it up in a couple of days (there were thousands of them!). Pump works well (unlike round-up).
customer_reviews.author: colby

customer_reviews.title: Really works’
customer_reviews.text: Never had a bug issue in my condo, saw 2 peat within a couple weeks, bought this and sprayed on my baseboards and heavily around the doors, not one bug since and it’s been 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: DYI Girl

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT; FIRE THE PROS
customer_reviews.text: We fired our professional exterminator when they could not correct an ant problem in our kitchen. After researching online, we bought this product and use it as directed. No ants in 12 months; when they reappeared, another treatment with this eliminated them completely again. We save hundreds of dollars annually since doing it ourselves. Oh, and no spiders or other bugs reside here either!
customer_reviews.author: Internet Rose

customer_reviews.title: for lasting results, and you can  get more spray without the clogging
customer_reviews.text: This is the bestselling bug spray, it really works. But the nozzle gets clogged fast. They really need to improve that. Sprayer is better
customer_reviews.author: sheri c.

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a place with a finished basement that kept having spiders show up in it. After spraying this around the perimeter of the rooms down there are no reports of anymore spiders. I've sprayed other possible bug intrusion points and still have plenty of this to spare. The sprayer works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Spector

customer_reviews.title: Tip to use this with a powered sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every year. This one only has a manual hand pump, but I kept the battery powered pump from the first one I used 2 years ago. The bottles are exactly the same, I just removed the pump and its cradle from the empty bottle. In the years after I only bought this cheaper version, and replaced the pump with the old one I kept. The original power pump is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kun

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works for ants /spiders
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works extremely well. I live in a garden unit and had small ants in my kitchen and bathroom. One spray of this along the base boards and the ants all dies and have not returned. It's been over 3 weeks. Best product I've found yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mama LisaK

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I lived without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff I spray it around my door and around the base board about 2 or 3 times a year and it keeps all the bugs out! No spiders running across the floor! I don't know how I lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: The only review you need to read...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works...don't listen to the negative reviews. I've used it for years and nothing has changed. No, it's not going to get every bug, but most every one...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have those large outside roaches at our office and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have those large outside roaches at our office and they come in. They die inside but not before freaking out some of the girls. Got this and used it Friday before closing for the weekend. Lots of dead bugs on Monday and I literally watched a roach run for the hills rather than through our door.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Fox

customer_reviews.title: We use this around the house and have had great result, no bugs
customer_reviews.text: We use this around the house and have had great result, no bugs. We spray it around the perimeter of the house and the bugs are dead the next day. I like that there is no odor and it's safe around the dogs (once its dry) Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: JessnPhil

customer_reviews.title: Kryptonite for creepy crawlies.
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at the effectiveness of this stuff. I used it to spray in my garage around the bases of the walls, and I see plenty of evidence that this spray is kryptonite to most crawlies. Millipedes, spiders, ants... seems that anything that creeps over the sprayed area becomes a carcass. Can't testify to the duration of 9 or 12 months as the label says, but it certainly lasted through spring and summer months for me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fox

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't see the ants after the spray, but I need to spray every week. There will still be ants for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ying

customer_reviews.title: Best home pesticide I’ve ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in FL and we have everything from various ants to huge cockroaches. Keeps them out and kills the ones inside
customer_reviews.author: karen bishop

product_meta.title: Ortho 0196710 Home Defense MAX Insect Killer Spray for Indoor and Home Perimeter, 1-Gallon (Ant, Roach, Spider, Stinkbug, Centipede Killer)
feature_bullets: Kills ants, roaches, spiders and many other listed, home invading insects
